entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 30. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
